section.title: Download the Geomajas SmartGwt Example Project
section.para: You can download example project an example project .

a) The download consists of a .zip file, containing the source code of the Example Project? If you want to change the source code, unzip the .zip file and change the corresponding files. (Then you would have to build it to a war.)
b) The downoad is a WAR file (Web application ARchive), containing a compiled application that can be run on a web container.

section.title: Running a war file
section.para: To run a war file, you need a web container, e.g. Apache Tomcat. Useful links for Tomcat:
Installation instructions and how to deploy war file

section.title: Create a maven project from the SmartGWT archetype
section.para: This is general info: command line creating/running/building Maven projects.

section.title: Prerequisits: Java and Maven
section.para: The project resulting from running the SmartGWT archetype, is a Maven project, using Java as the coding language. For that reason, both Maven and Java need to be installed on your computer. This section explains how to install and configure both simultaniously.
